a:r.a:t: Visit superwhisper.com or search "SuperWhisper" in the Mac App Store
Drag to Applications folder (direct download) or click Install (App Store)
System Preferences > Privacy & Security > Microphone > Enable SuperWhisper
On first launch, select a model (recommend "Medium" for balance). Download is ~1-2GB.
Hold Fn key (or custom hotkey) and speak. Release to transcribe.
Easiest option, auto-updates, sandboxed for security
Intel Macs supported but performance is slower
